A

add(ActionEvent) - Method in class control.AppointmentForm
The add method inserts a new appointment into the data layer, using then data in the appointment form fields.
add(ActionEvent) - Method in class control.CustomerForm
The add method inserts a new customer into the data layer, using then data in the customer form fields.

Creates a new appointment.
addAppointment(String, String, String, String, ZonedDateTime, ZonedDateTime, int, int, int) - Method in class data_access.SqlDB
Inserts an appointment record into the database.
addAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class control.Menu
Opens the AppointmentForm in a new window, when the form is closed it reloads the scene in the content pane.

Creates a new Customer.

addCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class control.Menu
Opens the CustomerForm in a new window, when the form is closed it reloads the scene in the content pane.
appointment - Static variable in class control.AppointmentForm
The static appointment member is used to load an existing appointment into the form.
Appointment - Class in model
The Appointment class defines objects which hold data for an appointment.

Constructor for appointment objects.
APPOINTMENT_FORM_FXML - Static variable in class control.Controller
 
AppointmentForm - Class in control
The AppointmentForm extends Controller and controls the appointment form, which allows for the creation and modification of appointments.
AppointmentForm() - Constructor for class control.AppointmentForm
 
appointmentView(ActionEvent) - Method in class control.Menu
Handles loading the schedule scene into content when Appointments is selected from the View menu.
